gpt-4-0314.name: Excellent
gpt-4-0314.description: Translation performed using gpt-4-0314, which provides higher accuracy but slower speed and higher cost. (This model is invitation-only and requires being added to the GPT-4 waitlist).

gpt-3.5-turbo.name: Optimal
gpt-3.5-turbo.description: Translation performed using gpt-3.5-turbo, offering a balanced choice between price and quality.

gpt-3.5-turbo-economy.name: Economy
gpt-3.5-turbo-economy.description: Translation performed using gpt-3.5-turbo without sending context, resulting in lower cost but lower translation quality. Some sentences may require manual correction.
